welcome_message_body: Welcome to Anzio, a charming coastal town known for its beautiful beaches, rich history, and delicious seafood. We invite you to explore and enjoy everything this vibrant city has to offer!

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Ciampino Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Ciampino Airport, mainly used for budget airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Leonardo Da Vinci Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Leonardo Da Vinci Airport, primarily serving low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. Simply connect to the network and follow the prompts to access the internet.
